scenario.name: Basic SIP Registration
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:svyaznoy.ru SIP/2.0 Route: <sip:[remote_ip]:[local_port];lr> CSeq: 1 REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport User-Agent: TestAgent/4.0.1 From: <sip:[field0]>;tag=[branch] To: <sip:[field0]> Contact: <sip:[field2]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=tcp> Allow: PRACK, INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, UPDATE, INFO, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, MESSAGE, OPTIONS Expires: 3600 Call-ID: [call_id] Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:svyaznoy.ru SIP/2.0 Route: <sip:[remote_ip]:[local_port];lr> CSeq: 1 REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport User-Agent: TestAgent/4.0.1 From: <sip:[field0]>;tag=[branch] To: <sip:[field0]> Contact: <sip:[field2]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=tcp> [field1] Allow: PRACK, INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, UPDATE, INFO, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, MESSAGE, OPTIONS Expires: 3600 Call-ID: [call_id] Content-Length: 0
